title: Deluminator
description: This website is my attempt of giving back what I learned to newcomers. I believe that there are too many conflicting articles on certain topics related to technologies which very easily can confuse a new comer. I want to guide them to the best of my knowledge.

title: Covid 19 Tracker
description: An app for tracking covid data that are available online from free APIs

title: Mini Portfolio
description: Small single page portfolio website. This website is fully responsive and also supports dark mode for chrome and Apple ecosystem.
